Entries.default: The large boar, its quills bristling, snorts and stamps its hoof.
The beast is taller than you are - and much heavier, all muscle, bone, and tusk.
"Who's a good boar? Who's a good little... ish... boar?"
[Pull yourself to your full height.] "Back off, beast!"
"You look hungry, fella. Here, maybe I've got something you can eat."
[Attack] "Let's get this over with."
[Back away slowly.] "I'll just be going now..."
The boar clomps over, eyeing you warily. It sniffs at you, then snorts.

The boar's eyes narrow as it snorts. You've never seen an expression of greater incredulity on a boar.

It stamps on the ground.
The boar's big brown eyes blink at you as it takes a few steps back. Then it turns and flees your terrifying presence.
In its flight, it leaves the necklace on the ground behind it.
Its head tilts to the side slightly, ears twitching and snout aquiver, and it cautiously hoofs towards you.
[Feed boar deadly huona mahe.] "Here's some nice, tasty mushrooms."
[Feed boar orlan's cradle.] "You like orlan's cradle? Everybody likes orlan's cradle."
[Feed the boar pork.] "I bet you love pork, donâ€™t you, boy?"
The boar snorts and shakes its head before taking another step towards you.
"How about we both go our own ways? No reason to get all... combative."
The beast snorts twice more... and charges.
The boar clomps over, eyeing you warily. It sniffs at you, then snorts.
"On second thought, I don't have anything for you."
Then growls. And finally attacks.

The boar sniffs at the mushrooms, then eats them out of your hand. 

Despite its size, the animal is surprisingly gentle.

It sniffs at you as if seeking more.

The boar sniffs at the mushrooms, then eats them out of your hand. 

Despite its size, the animal is surprisingly gentle.

It sniffs at you as if seeking more.

The boar sniffs at the offered meat. It looks up at you, searching you with one dark brown eye, then sniffs at the salted pork again.

It grunts. Then snorts.
Finally, the animal stills.
[Pet the boar.]
[Take the necklace from the boar's tusk.]
[Murder the boar.]
The boar cringes slightly as you move to scratch it behind the ear, but as you pet it, it relaxes, pressing its head into your palm, softly nuzzling at your belly.
The boar blinks quizzically as you remove the necklace from its tusk.
With a quick jab to the throat, you end the boar's life. Its eyes bulge as it collapses at your feet.
[Leave.] "Well, I should be off."
The boar snorts and watches you go.
The boar emits a despondent snort, its ears sinking on either side.

The boar whines, a long, mournful sound, one of its dark brown eyes searching yours.

It rolls over, paws at its own belly, and begins to shudder. Foam bubbles at its mouth.

The whine grows higher in pitch.
The boar blinks at your tiny orlan body.
[Feed boar deadly huona mahe.] "Here's some nice, tasty mushrooms."
"Here piggy, piggy, piggy."
"That's- that's a big pig."
